lotmcraft.ally_ability.description: Designate an entity as your ally
lotmcraft.holy_song_ability.description: Play a holy tune to buff yourself
lotmcraft.fire_of_light_ability.descript: Use Holy Fire to smite your foes
lotmcraft.holy_light_summoning_ability.d: Summon a Holy Light from the sky
lotmcraft.cleave_of_purification_ability: A holy strike in front of you
lotmcraft.notary_buff_ability.descriptio: Amplify your attacks by calling upon your god
lotmcraft.notary_debuff_ability.descript: Weaken your enemies by calling upon your god
lotmcraft.light_of_holiness_ability.desc: Summon blazing a hot pillar of light from the sky
lotmcraft.purification_halo_ability.desc: Produce a halo, that purifies everything
lotmcraft.unshadowed_spear_ability.descr: Condense a Spear made of pure Sunlight
lotmcraft.unshadowed_domain_ability.desc: Illuminate every corner of a region, and purify all entities in range
lotmcraft.flaring_sun_ability.descriptio: Summon a huge ball of pure Light condensed by sacred flame
lotmcraft.wall_of_light_ability.descript: Summon a Wall made of Light, that will not let enemies through it
lotmcraft.sword_of_justice_ability.descr: A Sword made of Light will strike enemies from above
lotmcraft.spear_of_light_ability.descrip: A Spear made of Pure White Light will be summoned, enemies hit by it won't be able to flee
lotmcraft.solar_envoy_ability.descriptio: Transform Yourself into a miniature Sun, setting ablaze everything in range
lotmcraft.wings_of_light_ability.descrip: Summon a pair of Wings, that let you fly
lotmcraft.pure_white_light_ability.descr: Under the pure White Light, everything will be disintegrated
lotmcraft.divine_kingdom_manifestation_a: Manifest an embryonic Divine Kingdom to immediately scorch all non beyonders and weaken other Beyonders to the point of helplessness
lotmcraft.pyrokinesis_ability.descriptio: Control flames, throwing fireballs, making walls made of fire, summoning fire ravens, condensing spears made of fire and let fire engulf everything in area
lotmcraft.cull_ability.description: Discover your enemies and their weaknesses, to increase your damage against them
lotmcraft.flame_mastery_ability.descript: Stronger version of Pyrokinesis. You can now throw multiple fireballs into enemies, erupt a massive explosion made of fire or transform into flame, soaring in the skies
lotmcraft.steel_mastery_ability.descript: Transform your body into steel to negate the damage, or transform your flame into steel to bind your enemies with it
lotmcraft.chain_of_command_ability.descr: Make Entities your subordinates. They will fight for you and you can spread your damage among them.
ability.lotmcraft.chain_of_command.no_co: The entity did not want to become your subordinate
lotmcraft.fog_of_war_ability.description: Create a dense fog to hinder your enemies and advantage yourself
lotmcraft.war_cry_ability.description: A deafening cry that damages your enemies and boosts your abilities
lotmcraft.war_song_ability.description: Buff your strength and speed with a song
lotmcraft.essence_of_war_ability.descrip: Summons a banner that debuffs enemies heavily and buffs you in a certain area
lotmcraft.flight_ability.description: Fly like a butterfly, sting like a wasp
lotmcraft.weather_manipulation_ability.d: Change the weather, causing snow storms, drought and tornados
lotmcraft.conquering_ability.description: Conquer all entities around you. If their Sequence is lower they will be rendered completely helpless and if not they will still struggle to resist
lotmcraft.flame_authority_ability.descri: Manipulate purple flame, throwing spears of destruction, summoning an inferno, that turns everything inside to a dust and flame vortex, burning every living creature around you to a crisp
lotmcraft.puppet_soldier_creation_abilit: Create 5 Puppet Soldiers, each equal to Sequence 4 Red Priest Demigod and command them
lotmcraft.raging_blows_ability.descripti: A series of powerful blows that damage your opp
lotmcraft.water_manipulation_ability.des: The ability to manipulate water to damage your opponent
lotmcraft.wind_manipulation_ability.desc: The ability to manipulate wind to damage your opponent
lotmcraft.lightning_ability.description: Summon lightnings to strike your opponent
lotmcraft.siren_song_ability.description: A song that affect your opponent in various ways
lotmcraft.tsunami_ability.description: Summon a tsunami to wash your opponent
lotmcraft.earthquake_ability.description: Cause a tremblor through the earth damage your opponent
lotmcraft.hurricane_ability.description: Summon a hurricane to rip through your opponent
lotmcraft.roar_ability.description: A deafening cry that damages your enemies
lotmcraft.lightning_branch_ability.descr: Shoot out a lightning that spread out to form a
lotmcraft.torrential_downpour_ability.de: Bring fouth a strong rainfall that deals damage the opponent
lotmcraft.lightning_storm_ability.descri: Summon a lightning storm that rains down a group of lightning, destroying your opponent
lotmcraft.calamity_creation_ability.desc: Summon a calamity creation to befall the area you stand
Transform your body into pure energy
lotmcraft.heavenly_punishment_ability.de: Call in a divine lightning to strike down your opponent
lotmcraft.roar_of_the_thunder_god_abilit: The cry of a god that destroy your enemies
lotmcraft.poisonous_flame_ability.descri: Flame that poisons and burns your enemy
lotmcraft.flame_spells_ability.descripti: Manipulate with flame to either shoot fireballs or make it explode around you
lotmcraft.language_of_foulness_ability.d: Language of devils, it has several uses, like slowing your target, corrupting them or deal massive damage with Death
lotmcraft.avatar_of_desire_ability.descr: Transform into illusionary, thick, black liquid that is a collection of emothions and desires. Anyone you touch will get corrupted, but if you stumble upon someone who is stronger than you, you will lose control
lotmcraft.defiling_seed_ability.descript: Bury your seed into target to corrupt them
lotmcraft.air_bullet_ability.description: Produce air projectile with power and speed comparable to bullets from revolver
lotmcraft.paper_figurine_substitute_abil: Create Substitutes out of paper to take your place when damaged
lotmcraft.flaming_jump_ability.descripti: Teleport into any fire, gaining fire resistance after doing so
lotmcraft.underwater_breathing_ability.d: Create a thin, invisible air pipe which allows you to breath underwater
lotmcraft.puppeteering_ability.descripti: Manipulate Spirit Body Threads to turn anyone into your marionette and command them
ability.lotmcraft.puppeteering.entity_tu: Turned the entity into your marionette
Failed to turn the entity into your marionette
lotmcraft.marionette_controlling_ability: Gain more options for controlling you marionettes. Press shift to cycle through all your marionettes
lotmcraft.historical_void_summoning_abil: Mark items or creatures to be able to summon them from Historic Void, they will disappear after some time, returning to Historic Void
ability.lotmcraft.historical_void_summon: You have already summoned the maximum number of items/entities!
Summoned item has returned to the void
Failed to summon entity: Unknown entity type!
Failed to spawn entity in world!
Summoned entity has returned to the void
Place items in your ender chest to mark them for summoning
lotmcraft.historical_void_hiding_ability: Hide in Historical Void being invisible, but unable to move, upon leaving it, you will be in exact same spot where you activated it
lotmcraft.midnight_poem_ability.descript: Recite a poem related to night to either put them to sleep or attack
lotmcraft.nightmare_ability.description: Put your target to sleep and enter their dream, in this state you can reshape blocks, making your enemies suffocate in them, restrain your target, attack them or teleport in short distances. After ending nightmare any damage to blocks will be reverted
lotmcraft.requiem_ability.description: Put your targets Spirit Body in sleep
lotmcraft.spirit_commanding_ability.desc: Command Spirits, making them obey to you
lotmcraft.night_domain_ability.descripti: Unleash Darkness to an Area, damaging them and giving them various debuffs, like blindness, slowness, misfortune and darkness. You will also receive buffs
lotmcraft.hair_entanglement_ability.desc: Bind your enemies with your hair
lotmcraft.horror_aura_ability.descriptio: Bring Fear into your enemies, unleashing your Horror Aura. They will be heavily debuffed and lose their sanity
lotmcraft.surge_of_darkness_ability.desc: Flood the area with Darkness, bringing Horror and Death to everything around you
lotmcraft.concealment_ability.descriptio: Conceal everything around you, effectively erasing it
lotmcraft.mighty_blow_ability.descriptio: Strike your target with one single powerful blow
lotmcraft.instigation_ability.descriptio: Instigate two mobs to attack each other
lotmcraft.instigation_ability.not_valid_: You have to select a target mob first
lotmcraft.instigation_ability.cannot_tar: You cannot instigate a mob to attack itself
lotmcraft.shadow_concealment_ability.des: Use shadows to conceal yourself from other people's eyes
lotmcraft.black_flame_ability.descriptio: Conjure Black Flames to burn your target, it is powerful and hard to extinguish
lotmcraft.frost_ability.description: Manipulate Ice to attack your targets, you can shoot with ice, condense it into spear or freeze whole area around you
lotmcraft.mirror_substitution_ability.de: Create Mirrors, taking damage will break one, teleporting you away and negating the damage
lotmcraft.thread_manipulation_ability.de: Manipulate thin and white threads to attack your enemies, you can shoot them, restrain your target or wrap yourself with it, gaining resistance against any damage
lotmcraft.charm_ability.description: Charm your enemy, it will slow them down and if it hits you, no damage will be dealt. You can't charm enemy twice
lotmcraft.disease_ability.description: Release deadly Disease that spreads in air, it will infect anything near you
lotmcraft.mirror_world_traversal_ability: Enter any glass to traverse between them. To exit it, you have to fly to any glass
lotmcraft.curse_ability.description: Curse your target to Death, to use it you have to hold target's blood in your offhand
ability.lotmcraft.curse.no_target: The owner of the blood could not be found
ability.lotmcraft.curse.no_blood: You need to have blood in your offhand
lotmcraft.petrification_ability.descript: Petrify enemies and surrounding into stone, stunning them for a long time
lotmcraft.disaster_manifestation_ability: Trigger natural disasters on your enemies, summoning tornados, causing blizzard and drought, causing meteors to fall from sky
lotmcraft.structural_collapse_ability.de: Collapse any building, cave, mountain, ocean and any structure, burying everything
lotmcraft.apocalypse_ability.description: Bring an End in area, dooming everything around you and transforming blocks into obsidian
lotmcraft.cleanse_ability.description: Cleanse yourself or others from negative effects
lotmcraft.plant_controlling_ability.desc: Command Plants to attack your enemies or bind them
lotmcraft.poison_creation_ability.descri: Create deadly poison and spread it in one area or pierce your enemies with it threads
lotmcraft.crossbreeding_ability.descript: Create hybrid between two animals, choose first animal for its form and second for its attributes
ability.lotmcraft.crossbreeding.not_vali: The target is not a valid mob for crossbreeding
ability.lotmcraft.crossbreeding.not_same: You can't cross a mob with itself
lotmcraft.nature_spells_ability.descript: Command Nature to aid you. Create large swamp area that traps your enemies, create a thick layer of wood on your skin to protect or unleash Nature's wrath onto your enemy
ability.lotmcraft.nature_spells.natures_: The target has already drawn the Wrath of Nature
lotmcraft.life_aura_ability.description: Emanate an Aura of Life nourishing plant growth and healing nearby entities
lotmcraft.mutation_creation_ability.desc: Randomly mutate your target, damaging them and draining their sanity
lotmcraft.life_deprivation_ability.descr: Drain life from your targets or your surroundings
lotmcraft.maternal_embrace_ability.descr: Seal your target in a coffin
ability.lotmcraft.maternal_embrace.too_s: You cannot seal a target with the same or higher Sequence
lotmcraft.area_desolation_ability.descri: Designate an area (200x200) that will become desolate and lifeless. Use the ability again in the same area to revert it back to normal
lotmcraft.blooming_area_ability.descript: Designate an area (200x200) that will become lush and flourish greatly. Inside there wil be no hunger and other various effects. Use the ability again in the same area to revert it back to normal
lotmcraft.door_opening_ability.descripti: Use on solid walls to pass through them
lotmcraft.spells_ability.description: Various spells of Trickmaster. Shock your enemies, make a breeeze, stun them with light or freeze them
lotmcraft.recording_ability.description: Record an ability of beyonder for one time usage
lotmcraft.travelers_door_ability.descrip: Travel through Spirit World to reach your destination, or enter it by yourself
lotmcraft.space_concealment_ability.desc: Separate a fixed space. Sneak while using to remove all concealed spaces. Use Collapse spaces to destroy anything inside and hurt entities.
lotmcraft.exile_ability.description: Banish your enemy to End, they will come back shortly after
lotmcraft.door_substitution_ability.desc: Create a Door Substitute, next damage will be transferred to door, saving you from it
lotmcraft.wandering_ability.no_dimension: Found no Dimension to travel to
lotmcraft.conceptualization_ability.desc: Transform into collection of symbols, gaining ability to fly and massively increase your move speed
lotmcraft.sealing_ability.description: Seal your enemies. In this state they won't be able to move and use their abilities
lotmcraft.space_tearing_ability.descript: Tear the space and make it become swallowed by the void
lotmcraft.waypoint_ability.description: Set Waypoints that you can then teleport to. Cycle through the waypoints by sneaking.
lotmcraft.black_hole_ability.description: Bend and Shatter space, time and light to create a Black Hole
lotmcraft.replicating_ability.descriptio: Replicate Beyonder abilities for multiple usage
lotmcraft.distortion_field_ability.descr: Create an area where enemies get randomly teleported around and find it hard to use their abilities
lotmcraft.area_miniaturization_ability.d: Bring an Area with you, miniaturizing it and saving it inside your inventory
lotmcraft.space_distortion_ability.descr: Create a localized anomaly that pulls in everything.
lotmcraft.pocket_dimension_ability.descr: Create a Pocket Dimension in other Dimension, no one can enter it, without your help
lotmcraft.excavated_area.description: Area that was miniaturized with Area Miniaturization
lotmcraft.space_time_storm_ability.descr: Unleash power, that is enough to shatter Space and Time, turning everything in range into Void, that is deadly to everyone without Void Immunity
lotmcraft.spectating_ability.description: Spectate the minds and thoughts of the people around you
lotmcraft.telepathy_ability.description: Read the minds of the people around you
lotmcraft.frenzy_ability.description: Thrown your enemies mind into distress
lotmcraft.placate_ability.description: Placate someone to stop them from loosing control
lotmcraft.psychological_invisibility_abi: Make yourself invisibility to a person's mind
lotmcraft.battle_hypnosis_ability.descri: Control your enemies to do abnormal actions for a short period of time
lotmcraft.dragon_scales_ability.descript: Create dragon scales that cover your skin to protect you
lotmcraft.sleep_inducement_ability.descr: Cause your enemies to fall asleep
lotmcraft.dream_traversal_ability.descri: Travel to the a person asleep
lotmcraft.nightmare_spectator_ability.de: Cause your enemies to dream a nightmare, dealing damage
lotmcraft.manipulation_ability.descripti: Control the movement of your target
lotmcraft.mental_plague.description: Spread a mental plague that will slowly drive all entities to insanity
lotmcraft.mind_invasion.description: Invade your opponents Mind Island. The more you destroy the more sanity they will lose
lotmcraft.identity_avatar_ability.descri: Split of Virtual Persona and weave it into an Avatar
lotmcraft.psyche_storm_ability.descripti: Create an area of effect that cause your enemies to loose control
lotmcraft.calamity_attraction_ability.de: Call upon a calamity to befall your enemies
lotmcraft.luck_release_ability.descripti: Release all of your accumulated luck
lotmcraft.misfortune_gifting_ability.des: Give to your enemies, a misfortune onto them
lotmcraft.blessing_ability.description: Give a blessing gifted to your allies
lotmcraft.spiritual_baptism_ability.desc: Make the targets spirit clean and stable, effectively removing all mental effects
lotmcraft.words_of_misfortune_ability.de: Leave behind words of Misfortune that will bring anyone who steps near them great misfortune
lotmcraft.prophecy_ability.description: Speak a Prophecy. Once spoken it has a high chance to turn true
ability.lotmcraft.prophecy.disaster: I prophesy a great Calamity will befall us
ability.lotmcraft.prophecy.fortune: I prophesy that a great fortune shall come to pass
ability.lotmcraft.prophecy.misfortune_fo: I prophesy that great misfortune shall come to those who oppose me
lotmcraft.theft_ability.description: If used on Player, it will attempt to steal any item from his inventory. If used on Mob, it will give random drop related to them, like meat from animals or arrows from skeleton
lotmcraft.decryption_ability.description: Gain insight into you enemies and what items they posses
lotmcraft.gift_ability.description: Gift the item in your offhand to your target. Some items may have different effects, like tnt or anvils
ability.lotmcraft.gift.no_item: You need to hold an item in your offhand to gift it
lotmcraft.ability_theft_ability.descript: Steal an ability from your opponent making them unable to use it for a short time. This ability will grow stronger with your Sequence
ability.lotmcraft.ability_theft.not_beyo: The target is not a Beyonder
lotmcraft.mundane_conceptual_theft_abili: Steal mundane abilities from your target, like their sight, ability to walk, distance between you and the target or their health
lotmcraft.parasitation_ability.descripti: Possess your target, you are invulnerable until it dies
ability.lotmcraft.parasitation.target_to: Target is too strong to parasitize
lotmcraft.host_controlling_ability.descr: Control your Host, either Draining their health to Heal yourself or kill them
lotmcraft.avatar_creation_ability.descri: Create an Avatar of yourself, it will be 1 sequence below you
lotmcraft.deceit_ability.description: Deceive surrounding enemies for them to forget about you, or deceive the world to be invulnerable for a short time
lotmcraft.loophole_creation_ability.desc: Create an Area, where enemies will be randomly teleported around and their abilities will be stolen
lotmcraft.fate_siphoning_ability.descrip: Siphon someone's Fate, anything that is going to harm you, will be transferred
lotmcraft.conceptual_theft_ability.descr: Steal Concepts, Steal Day, making it Night, or Steal Night, making it Day. You can also steal an Area and save it in your inventory
item.lotmcraft.ability_not_implemented: Abilities for this Sequence are not yet implemented
item.lotmcraft.passive_theft_ability.des: You have a chance to steal items from mobs or players you hit
ability.lotmcraft.passive_luck.trip: Your enemy tripped and took damage
ability.lotmcraft.passive_luck.effect_re: You were cleansed of negative effects through Luck
item.lotmcraft.passive_luck_ability.desc: Gain Passive Luck that grows with your Sequence
item.lotmcraft.paper_dagger_ability.desc: Right click with paper to throw it as a dagger
item.lotmcraft.puppeteering_enhancements: Your range has increased massively and the time it takes was reduced greatly. Your marionettes can now use your abilities. The number of marionettes was increased
item.lotmcraft.blood_loss_ability.descri: Targets you hit have a chance to loose their blood when attacked. You can use the blood for curses or rituals.
item.lotmcraft.mirror_revival_ability.de: If there is glass near you, you will resurrect after death
item.lotmcraft.riptide_ability.descripti: Your Beyonder Abilities get stronger while you are in water
item.lotmcraft.hornacis_gray_mountain_go: Horn of a Gray Hornacis Mountain Goat
item.lotmcraft.true_root_of_mist_treant: True Root of a Mist Treant
item.lotmcraft.spirit_eater_stomach_pouc: Stomach Pouch of a Spirit Eater
item.lotmcraft.blue_shadow_falcon_feathe: Feathers of a Blue Shadow Falcon
item.lotmcraft.dragon_eyed_condor_eyebal: Eyeball of a Dragon Eyed Condor
item.lotmcraft.shadowless_demonic_wolf_h: Heart of a Shadowless Demonic Wolf
item.lotmcraft.thousand_faced_hunter_blo: Blood of a Thousand Faced Hunter
item.lotmcraft.dream_eating_raven_heart: Heart of a Dream Eating Raven
item.lotmcraft.black_hunting_spider_comp: Composite Eyes of a Black Hunting Spider
item.lotmcraft.goat_horned_blackfish_blo: Blood from a Goat Horned Blackfish
item.lotmcraft.illusory_chime_tree_fruit: Fruit from an Illusory Chime Tree
item.lotmcraft.rainbow_salamander_pituit: Pituitary Gland of a Rainbow Salamander
item.lotmcraft.tree_of_elders_fruit: Fruit of the Tree of Elders
item.lotmcraft.abyss_demonic_fish_blood: Blood of an Abyss Demonic Fish
item.lotmcraft.mist_watcher_crystal: Crystal left by a Mist Watcher
item.lotmcraft.whale_of_punishment_stoma: Stomach of a Whale of Punishment
item.lotmcraft.king_of_green_wings_eye: Eye of the King of Green Wings

advancements.lotmcraft.root.description: Begin your journey as a Beyonder
lotm.sefirot.wrong_pathway: Your Pathway does not align with the Sefirot
lotm.ally.cannot_ally_beyonder: Cannot ally with beyonder entities without their permission
lotm.temporarily_disabled: This ability is temporarily disabled and will be reenabled shortly
lotm.beyonder_message.full: Become a Beyonder of the %s Pathway at Sequence %s

lotmcraft.griefing_enabled_required: Enable griefing for this ability to work
lotmcraft.own_prayings: You have heard your own prayings
lotmcraft.far_away_prayings: You have heard whispers of prayings, but you are too far away to hear them clearly

You have heard prayings from %1$s
